name: Super Mario Bros. Dimensions
description: The full game is here! This is an 8-Bit 2D Mario platform game, set between Super Mario Bros. 3 and Super Mario World, featuring a "dimension-switching" gimmick that allows you to change the appearance and design of a level at the press of a button. You can also save personal records for the time taken and coins collected for each level, and there are new power-ups, like the Jetpack and the Laser Flower. With over 50 levels, 300 Star Coins to collect, secret levels, collectible Character Cards, an Easy Mode for beginners and a Hard Mode for experts, there's plenty to do!
